My Vision

What drives my passion

Inspiration

As a student-athlete at Grady High School, my vision is to merge the worlds of sports, technology, and community service. I'm fascinated by how programming can empower individuals, whether through data analytics in sports or building accessible tools for mental health advocacy.

I aim to continue my studies in computer science and physiology, exploring how software can enhance athletic training and recovery. My goal is to create inclusive tech-driven solutions that benefit both athletes and everyday people.
